full_summary:
# Pump Unit, Centrifugal
## Solicitation Information

**Solicitation Number:** # W8482-241613/A
**Tender Closing Date:** June 16, 2023 at 02:00 PM Eastern Time (ET)
**Publication Date:** May 17, 2023
**Contracting Entity:** National Defence
**Contracting Entity Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

## Tender Description
The National Defence Institution is seeking proposals for the supply and delivery of Pump Unit, Centrifugal. The delivery is requested to Canads Forces Base (CFB) Halifax and CFB Esquimalt. 

## Items Required
Two (2) items are required:

*   Item 1: Pump Unit, Centrifugal, Part No.: 97064, NCAGE: 3AH45, SPRINGCREST INC., Quantity: 6, Unit of Issue: EA
*   Item 2: Pump Unit, Centrifugal, Part No.: 97064, NCAGE: 3AH45, SPRINGCREST INC., Quantity: 6, Unit of Issue: EA

## Product Requirements
Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must provide the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and the NCAGE.

## Submission Requirements
Submissions must be made in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Contacts and Resources
For more information, please contact Christopher Cauchi at (555) 555-5555 or christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca. Tender documents can be accessed online [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5590/w848
